Settings.description: Defines the globabl settings for Sourcebot.

maxFileSize.description: The maximum size of a file (in bytes) to be indexed. Files that exceed this maximum will not be indexed. Defaults to 2MB.

maxTrigramCount.description: The maximum number of trigrams per document. Files that exceed this maximum will not be indexed. Default to 20000.

reindexIntervalMs.description: The interval (in milliseconds) at which the indexer should re-index all repositories. Defaults to 1 hour.

resyncConnectionPollingIntervalMs.description: The polling rate (in milliseconds) at which the db should be checked for connections that need to be re-synced. Defaults to 1 second.

reindexRepoPollingIntervalMs.description: The polling rate (in milliseconds) at which the db should be checked for repos that should be re-indexed. Defaults to 1 second.

maxConnectionSyncJobConcurrency.description: The number of connection sync jobs to run concurrently. Defaults to 8.

maxRepoIndexingJobConcurrency.description: The number of repo indexing jobs to run concurrently. Defaults to 8.

maxRepoGarbageCollectionJobConcurrency.description: The number of repo GC jobs to run concurrently. Defaults to 8.

repoGarbageCollectionGracePeriodMs.description: The grace period (in milliseconds) for garbage collection. Used to prevent deleting shards while they're being loaded. Defaults to 10 seconds.

repoIndexTimeoutMs.description: The timeout (in milliseconds) for a repo indexing to timeout. Defaults to 2 hours.

connections.description: Defines a collection of connections from varying code hosts that Sourcebot should sync with. This is only available in single-tenancy mode.
